articles.description: The Killers have set another new chart record in the UK with 'Mr. Brightside', which has now spent a total of five years in the top 100
articles.content:
The Killers have set a new record in the UK singles chart after their song ‘Mr. Brightside’ surpassed 260 non-consecutive weeks – or five full years – in the top 100.
First released as a single in 2… [+1592 chars]
